record.field: SELECT Id, Name, Supplier_Category__c, Supplier_Status__c, Account_Level__c, LastModifiedDate, BillingCountry, BillingState, BillingAddress, BillingStreet, Phone, Fax, Area_of_expertise__c, Sharepoint_Folder__c, Sharepoint_ID__c, Supplier_Description__c, Key_Information__c, Project_Assistant__c, Supplier_Selection_Form_completed__c, Website, Create_Sharepoint_Folder__c, OwnerId, Is_supplier__c, VCLS_Main_Contact__c, Supplier__c, Type, Project_Controller__c, VCLS_Alt_Name__c, Supplier_Project__c, Activity__c, Product_Type__c, Industry, KimbleOne__InvoicingCurrencyIsoCode__c, Invoice_Administrator__c FROM Account
Id IN ( SELECT AccountId FROM Contact WHERE Automated_Migration__c = True )

SELECT Id, Name, AccountId, Phone, Fax, OwnerId, LastModifiedDate, LinkedIn_Profile__c, Category__c, Supplier__c, Salutation, Email, Title, MobilePhone, MailingAddress, AccountWebsite__c, Description, MailingCountry, Inactive_Contact__c, CurrencyIsoCode, Opted_In__c, VCLS_Main_Contact__c, Unsubscribed_from_Marketing_Comms__c, VCLS_Initial_Contact__c FROM Contact

SELECT Id, Name, AccountId, StageName, Therapeutic_Area__c, OwnerId, LastModifiedDate, ExpectedRevenue, Reasons_Lost_Comments__c, Probability, CloseDate, Deadline_for_Sending_Proposal__c, LeadSource, Description, Client_Product_Description__c, CurrencyIsoCode, Product_Category__c, Amount, Geographic_Area__c, VCLS_Activities__c,Project_start_date__c FROM Opportunity

SELECT Id, Name, OwnerId, Activity__c, Address, City, Company, Content_Name__c, Country,PostalCode, Street, CurrencyIsoCode, Email,First_VCLS_Contact_Point__c, External_Referee__c, Fax, Functional_Focus__c, Inactive_Lead__c, Industry, Contact_us_Message__c, Initial_Product_Interest__c, LastModifiedDate, Title, Seniority__c, Phone, Website, Description, LeadSource FROM Lead

SELECT Id, LastModifiedDate, Name, External_Contract_Name__c, AccountId, CompanySignedDate, CompanySignedId, ContractNumber, ContractTerm, Contract_End_Date__c, Contract_Update__c, Contract_URL__c, CurrencyIsoCode, CustomerSignedDate, CustomerSignedId, CustomerSignedTitle, EndDate,Link_to_Parent_Contract__c, OwnerId, Parent_Contract_Name__c, Parent_Contract_Type__c, Replaces_Supersedes__c, Type_of_Contract__c, VCLS_Status__c FROM Contract
